snippet: The New York Times/Siena College Poll of New York City consists of telephone interviews with 1,371 adult residents throughout the city conducted July 9 to July 15. Of these, 1,010 said they were registered to vote.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times/Siena College Poll of New York City consists of telephone interviews with 1,371 adult residents throughout the city conducted July 9 to July 15. Of these, 1,010 said they were registered to vote.
